resources.string: Once Night mode is enabled, you might need to reconfigure the tiles in the status bar by clicking on \'EDIT\'

It appears you don\'t have SysUI tuner enabled \n 1. Enable \'SysUI Tuner\' by pulling down the status bar. Press and hold the settings icon until you get a notification asking if you want to enable \'System UI tuner\'. Enable it. \n 2. Click on the \'Enable Night mode\' button here
